data.title: Here are all Demon Slayer episodes from every season and where to watch them
data.meta_description: Complete list of all Demon Slayer episodes from every season animated by ufotable, including the all the arcs that were adapted from the manga.
data.text:
Updated on June 24, 9:00 a.m. (GMT+8): Added season 4 episode.

Demon Slayer is currently one of the top anime franchises in Japan.

Following the success of the manga created by Koyoharu Gotouge, the franchise kept growing, culminating in the release of the Demon Slayer Mugen Train arc movie. The film earned over US$500 million worldwide, winning both Best Animation and Best Film in the Crunchyroll 2022 Anime Awards.

To help you catch up on all the episodes you’ve missed, we’ve listed down all Demon Slayer episodes from every season.

Seasons 1, 2, and 3 have already concluded, totaling 55 episodes combined. Season 4 begins on May 13, 2024.

All Demon Slayer episodes from every season

Season 1

Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba’s first season aired from April 6, 2019, to September 28, 2019, in Japan. The English episodes were broadcast from October 13, 2019, to May 3, 2020.

Demon Slayer’s Mugen Train movie premiered on October 16, 2020, in Japan. The film’s international release spanned from late 2020 to mid-2021.

Demon Slayer anime season 2

The Demon Slayer anime’s second season was split into two arcs. The Mugen Train arc aired from October 10, 2021, to November 2021, while the Entertainment District arc was broadcast from December 5 to February 13, 2022.

Mugen Train arc

In the Mugen Train arc, Tanjiro and his comrades join the fiery Flame Hashira, Kyojuro Rengoku, on a special mission aboard the Infinity Train.

They must confront a devious demon manipulating passengers’ dreams and draining their life force, all while facing their own deepest desires and anxieties.

Entertainment District arc

In the second half of season 2, Tanjiro and Nezuko team up with the flamboyant Sound Hashira, Tengen Uzui. To investigate disappearances and slay a lurking demon, they go undercover in Yoshiwara, the red-light district.

Disguised as women, they navigate a world of glitz and danger, facing a formidable Upper Rank demon and a brutal fight for survival.

Demon Slayer anime season 3

Season 3 of the anime takes Tanjiro and Nezuko to the hidden Swordsmith Village. There, they join forces with powerful Hashira to protect the village from a demonic attack.

As Tanjiro gets his broken sword reforged, he hones his skills in preparation for even fiercer battles.

Demon Slayer anime season 4

Season 4 follows the Hashira Training arc. Tanjiro Kamado and his allies continue their fight against demons.

Under the tutelage of the elite Hashira swordsmen, they’ll push their skills to the limit as they prepare for an impending showdown against the ultimate demon, Muzan Kibutsuji.

Where to watch the Demon Slayer anime

Fans can stream the anime on the following platforms:

Netflix

Crunchyroll

Hulu
